info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 29 at 3:58PM EDT until August 29 at 4:15PM EDT by NWS Grand Rapids
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN ALLEGAN...KENT AND NORTHWESTERN BARRY COUNTIES... At 357 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Saranac, or 10 miles southwest of Ionia, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. This storm has a history of producing damaging winds and power outages. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Grand Rapids... Hastings... Wyoming... Kentwood... Walker... Grandville... East Grand Rapids... Rockford... Sparta... Wayland... Lowell... Middleville... Caledonia... Freeport... Gerald R. Ford Inter... Ada... Dorr... Grattan... Cedar Springs... Irving... THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: Prepare immediately for large hail and damaging winds. People outside should move to a shelter, inside a strong building and away from windows.
